name: After Sports
description:
Use an auto-correct-like interface to comment on sports.

Choose words to make funny sentences by clicking the buttons. Don't like the options? Try the UM button to say a random filler word (like, um, ya know) and get new choices. 

Press a punctuation button to end the sentence. 

At the end you can watch a replay of the full broadcast!

Made for TOJam Hindsight is 2020!
